name: Escape Wales (Magssss)
description:
Overview

2.5D Platformer with WWII Setting and historical elements.

Controls

W,A,S,D - Walk 

Spacebar - Jump 

Crouch - C 

Interaction with objects - E 

Enter - Progress dialogue

Backspace - Pause

The Team

Jan - Lead Programmer, Project Lead 

Max - Programmer, Level Scripting 

Leon - Programmer, Level Scripting 

Tim - Art, Level Design
